docs.text:
ReJSON-PHP
¶


PHP client library for the 
ReJSON
 Redis module which provides a native JSON data type for Redis.


Requirements
¶




Redis running with the 
Redis-ML
.


PHP >=7


PhpRedis
, 
Predis
, or 
php-redis-client
.




Install
¶


composer install ethanhann/rejson




Load
¶


require_once
 
'vendor/autoload.php'
;
